description: <!-- Every README should start with an H1 --> # The Audio Diary Project  <!-- A one sentence description of the project or assignment --> The Audio Diary is a website that allows people to express their feelings. The website converts the speech into visual representation with geometric shapes following the pastel color palette. [You can try it here.](https://yitingliu97-audio-diary.glitch.me/)
